alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:34PM EST until December 21 at 10:59AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Sagadahoc and Kennebec Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Skowhegan. * WHEN...Until late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 80,000.0 cfs, East River Road floods to a depth of 1 to 2 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM EST Monday the flow was 20,431.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 101,590.0 cfs tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood flow is 35,000.0 cfs. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
